member.name: T:BatchProcess.Controllers.BatchController
member.summary: Controller for handling batch processing operations.

member.name: M:BatchProcess.Controllers.BatchController.#ctor(BatchProcess.Repository.ICustomerRepository)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The customer repository to use for data operations.

member.name: M:BatchProcess.Controllers.BatchController.BulkUpload(BatchProcess.Dtos.BulkUploadRequest)
member.summary: Uploads a batch of customer records.
member.param: The bulk upload request containing customer data.
member.returns: An IActionResult indicating the result of the bulk upload operation.
member.response: Returns the success message and records processed.
If the request is invalid or has no customer data.
